channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22645] Jline can break bash terminal behavior
item.description:
After HIVE-21954, running a qtest can break bash terminal (but not zsh), in a way that, e.g. enter key doesn't break line...
As identified by kgyrtkirk, this line could cause this:
https://github.com/apache/hive/commit/d645d827d95de36175194407bd1e2f6725362aff#diff-c64cf2b501f04e6710bbc3fcd079156fR84
item.summary: Jline can break bash terminal behavior

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
it seems like a sqlline/jline bug, after upgrading it disappears (+jline dependency was added, I think from a certain point sqlline didn't contain jline itself)
+testing: all metastore integration tests passed

kgyrtkirk: could you please take a look? cc: mgergely

+1 overall

ATTACHMENT ID: 12989267 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

I have been seeing a similar problem past last week. In my case, terminal stopped echoing input characters after running any qtest. I found out that the root cause for both this issue and my issue happen because jline turns off stty settings "-icanon min 1 -icrnl -inlcr -ixon -echo" and fails to restore them after jvm exits. This issue has been solved in https://github.com/jline/jline2/issues/163 . 

I think this patch is good but it does not solve the problem completely unless you update `jline.version` in root pom.xml along with standalone metastore. Please update jline version in root pom xml too.

uploading new patch
thanks for the input mustafaiman
for me, standalone-metastore jline upgrade solved the problem, but for clarity's sake, it's better two have unified jline across the project
TestHiveCli failures looked related, but passed locally...I'll check again if they fail in next preCommit too

+1 overall

awesome!
